application_instruction: Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Chicago, IL, USA
description:
Google accountants are a savvy bunch who handle the core accounting responsibilities at Google. As a member of this team, you know your accounting principles and the full accounting process end to end. You'll advise on financial reports required by governmental regulations, and you'll review, analyze, and interpret financial and budgetary reports -- and all this sounds like fun to you. Every day is a new challenge, and you're continually looking for ways to help our team get better at what we do, in the most efficient way possible. A team player at heart, you collaborate with our global team, advocate best practices and roll up your sleeves to pitch in when it's all hands on deck. You move fast while keeping your attention to detail, and you tap into your problem-solving skills to support Google's business objectives.

In this role, you will have the opportunity to build strong business relationships with our Real Estate Workplace Services (REWS) teams and establish sustainable processes to enable us to ensure completeness and accuracy of our lease population. You are enthusiastic about working on collaborative global teams while performing a broad array of financial and management accounting activities.

The name Google came from "googol," a mathematical term for the number 1 followed by 100 zeros. And nobody at Google loves big numbers like the Finance team when providing in depth analysis on all manner of strategic decisions across Google products. From developing forward-thinking analysis to generating management reports to scaling our automated financial processes, the Finance organization is an important partner and advisor to the business.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Certified Public Accountant or Chartered accountant.
  • 8 years of relevant work experience in Accounting and/or Finance.
  • Experience in Real Estate Accounting.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience driving process improvement. Subject matter expert in Lease Accounting and experience with IFRS 16/ASC 842.
  • General accounting knowledge. Excellent SQL skills.
  • Ability to influence across the company and to interact at all levels.
  • Ability to deal with ambiguity.
  • Genuine excitement for driving business decisions by analyzing large and complex data sets.
  • Excellent communication and project management skills.
responsibilities:
• Lead the accounting process for various real estate tasks to create executable policies and procedures. Recognize potential areas of risk and develop risk management solutions.
  • Present month-end results, business reviews and deal reviews to upper level management related to the lease and rental income portfolio.
  • Provide guidance to leverage common best practice processes to achieve improved timing and accuracy of our financial close practices.
  • Support new and existing Google products by working cross-functionally with REWS, external reporting, technical accounting, internal audit, legal, tax, IT, FP&A and business controllers.
  • Identify opportunities for process improvements, system improvements and drive implementation of the solutions.
title: Real Estate Accounting Lead
